name: Lares Trek To Machu Picchu, 4 Days
description: This special trek is about being back in time to see the closest descendants of the incas wrongly called "indians", we must call them early peruvians or native peruvians, who are still living in stone-thatched roof houses, using the same old techniques for looming, farming, dehydrating of  potatoes, meat, only eating what they really produce by subsistence farming mainly the different species of andean tubers (potatoes and local named ocas, ollucos,etc) and locally raising of llamas and alpacas to get meat and wool for looming.
